H0.text: Of which organisation, founded in Manchester in 1838, were Richard Cobden and John Bright the principal figures. Manchester Reform Association

H1.text: Of which organisation, founded in Manchester in 1838, were Richard Cobden and John Bright the principal figures. The Lancashire Public School Association

H2.text: Of which organisation, founded in Manchester in 1838, were Richard Cobden and John Bright the principal figures. The British Anti-Slavery Society

H3.text: Of which organisation, founded in Manchester in 1838, were Richard Cobden and John Bright the principal figures. Anti-Corn-Law

A4.text: The nationwide League, founded in 1838, had Richard Cobden and John Bright among its leaders.

A5.text: Cobden was the chief strategist; Bright was its great orator.
